articles.title: The HPV Vaccine: Why HPV Vaccination Is a Must for Cervical Cancer Prevention - APN News
articles.description: By:  Dr Salim V P , Senior consultant ,Surgical oncologist and Robotic Surgeon , Aster MIMS, Calicut  In India, 511.4 million women aged 15 and up are at risk of having cervical cancer. According to a report by Globocan 2020, Cervical cancer is the second mos…
